}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== According to [http://pci-ids.ucw.cz/read/PC/14e4/4329/17370058 this PCI IDs repository page], the subsystem is 1737:0058.
"WPIB-124GN_V01 ENG-X06-7001R" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos.
